name: @neardefi/shade-agent-js
author: Owen Hassall <github.com/pivortex>

scripts.build:sandbox: cd ./contracts/sandbox && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=--enable-bulk-memory' cargo near build non-reproducible-wasm
scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs --dts && cp package.json dist/package.json
scripts.build:test: npm run build && rm -rf docker-api/dist && mkdir docker-api/dist && cp dist/* docker-api/dist
scripts.docker-api:build: cd docker-api && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t pivortex/api-image:latest . && docker push pivortex/api-image:latest

description: This library is intended to be used in conjunction with the [shade agent template](https://github.com/NearDeFi/shade-agent-template/).
